DOC.brief_summary: To determine efficacy safety 12 week treatment Differin Gel , 0.1 % compare 12 week treatment Tazorac Cream , 0.1 % compare 6 week treatment Differin Gel , 0.1 % follow 6 week treatment Tazorac Cream

DOC.criteria: Subjects minimum 20 inflammatory lesion ( papule pustule ) face Subjects minimum 15 maximum 100 noninflammatory lesion ( open comedo close comedo ) face , exclude nose Subjects 3 nodulocystic lesion
